projects.name: Live Events Website
projects.description: Enable users to mark events as favourites for quick access and personalized recommendations. Dive deep into our advanced search capabilities to pinpoint events based on location, date, category, and more, helping you find the perfect experience with ease.

projects.name: Real Time Chat Application
projects.description: Real Time online status of an account and broadcast quickly to the channel.Real time messaging service and stores messages built using Web Sockets and Channels.Includes audio alerts for new messages and notifications to keep users informed. Supports seamless simultaneous messaging system.

projects.name: Stock Monitor System
projects.description: Built a high-performance stock monitoring system integrating Alpha Vantage for real-time stock data, including high, open, low, and close prices. The system allows users to add stocks to their watchlist, featuring an attractive user interface for intuitive interaction.

projects.name: Automation Deletion Tasks
projects.description: To Prevent Server from having Fake accounts with Fake emails.Sends a mail to the registered mail to verify his/her account.Retrieves and Deletes Users Who are not verified through email will loss their account after 2 days.Every day at 12:00 AM task reschedules and runs periodically using celery beat.

projects.name: Library Software using JWT Authentication
projects.description: Library Management System with JSON Web Token based Authentication.A User gets Access Token and Refresh Token when he signs in. Access Token Expires at every 50 minutes and new token generate using the Refresh token

projects.name: User Portal Application
projects.description: Users can upload files and checkout whenever they want for their needs. If we need a copy, we can download easily by clicking download button. It is also use as a storage for backup purposes.

projects.name: Hospital Management Software
projects.description: A Web Portal for Patient and Doctors for Hospital Management. Doctors Can Hold their Patient Records. Patients can check their medicine, documents and contact doctor

projects.name: Razor Pay Payment
projects.description: Integrated Django Application with Razor pay Payment Gateway. Can easily attach to a Demo Website for testing payments.
